com.ojcoleman.ahni.event

Class AHNIEvent

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ojcoleman.ahni.event.AHNIEvent

  • public class AHNIEvent
extends java.lang.Object
    Class to encapsulate information about events that occur during the course of an evolutionary run in AHNI.
    See Also:
    AHNIEventListener, HyperNEATEvolver, Properties

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  AHNIEvent.Type
      Indicates the type of event that has occurred.

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      HyperNEATEvolver getEvolver()
      Returns the HyperNEATEvolver that is handling this run.
      java.lang.Object getSource()
      Returns the object that was the source of this event.
      AHNIEvent.Type getType()
      Returns the AHNIEvent.Type of this event.
